definition: to cross the limit/to be over the accepted norm/excessive
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: Pregnant mothers may also be concerned about eating fish because of the mercury content.
sentences.chinese: 准妈妈也对吃鱼有顾虑，担心其汞含量超标。

sentences.english: People can easily understand toys lathered over with lead paint.
sentences.chinese: 人们可以轻易理解油漆含铅超标的玩具。

sentences.english: Appropriate testing is needed to ensure that no blending of OOS material is occurring.
sentences.chinese: 合适的测试是为了确保不发生超标批次参与混粉。

sentences.english: Check the L MLG hydraulic tube leakage is out of limits.
sentences.chinese: 检查发现左主起落架一液压管漏油超标。

sentences.english: Those who are overweight or indulge in high-salt diets are candidates for hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 体重超标或酷爱高盐饮食的人很可能患高血压。

sentences.english: Which Intel processor first introduced superscalar execution?
sentences.chinese: 哪一款Intel处理器首先引入超标量执行？

sentences.english: Pollution in Type I pond is very serious, especially, the content of phenol in carp far exceed quota.
sentences.chinese: 型塘水质污染相当严重，尤其是鲤鱼酚含量严重超标。

sentences.english: The addition water for liquor requires softening treatment, otherwise it would result in solids content above the standard.
sentences.chinese: 白酒加浆水需经软化处理，否则会造成固形物超标。

sentences.english: Residents said the real number of sick people could be much higher.
sentences.chinese: 当地居民称，血铅超标的实际人数高于这一数字。

sentences.english: Conclusions The phenomenon that water fluoride concentration outnumbers the standard is overwhelming.
sentences.chinese: 结论山东省改水降氟工程的水氟超标现象严重。

sentences.english: The observation results made by labor and safety authority find that displacement of crane girder exceeded the allowable standard.
sentences.chinese: 经劳动安全部门监测，发现门机主梁下挠度超标。

sentences.english: It is a difficult problem to decrease the amount of nitrite in a normal limit of vegetables pickling.
sentences.chinese: 亚硝酸盐含量超标一直是腌渍蔬菜生产中的一个难题。

sentences.english: According to the testing conclusions, the company acts as Ms. Lee for the renovation will not result in formaldehyde standard.
sentences.chinese: 公司为李女士进行的装修行为不会造成甲醛超标。

sentences.english: Unaccebtable defects was found during the welding of surge pipeline of TNPS.
sentences.chinese: 田湾核电站波动管的焊接过程中出现了超标缺陷。

sentences.english: The solids in liquor surpassing the standards have always been a difficult problem in liquor-making industry.
sentences.chinese: 白酒中固形物超标，一直是困扰酒界的一大难题。

definition: to detect/to examine and discover/to sense
